title: Cognitive Science-Based Statistics Practice Mastery Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics (descriptive and inferential) and foundational R/Python programming skills
context.additional_context: Optimizing mobile learning via smartphones, collaboration environment centered on data analysis projects.

learning_goals: Participants can independently apply three or more statistical analysis techniques (t-test, regression analysis, time-series forecasting) in a smartphone environment using real datasets.
Through microlearning modules incorporating cognitive science principles (distributed learning, retrieval practice), participants can retain 20 cumulative statistical concepts over four weeks.
In team-based data analysis projects, participants document statistical decision-making processes, perform peer reviews three or more times, and complete practical reports.

resources: Mobile-Optimized Statistical Analysis Apps (Shiny, JMP Mobile)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
